spoken in little old lady voice

puts nesting cup down . puts hand up toward other nesting cup and puts cup in hand . attempts to put in nesting cup on floor
lifts up nesting cup again . holds . lowers toward floor and sets down

holds out nesting cup toward nesting cup stack
puts both cups down . takes out top cup and puts down . picks up bottom cup and puts in nesting cup stack

puts orange cup on stack . attempts to put other cup on top
picks up nesting cup from floor and holds toward stack

continues taking toys out of dollhouse
examines nesting cup briefly then puts down . holds nesting cup stack with both hands . divides stack in two
